document_data.name: Ranthor
document_data.text: ''"My life was full, especially these last three years that you were with me. May yours be as much and more. Farewell, Shal Bal of Cormyr".''
document_data.mainbody: As a teacher, Ranthor was kind and giving, always providing his students with positive encouragement and motivation.
document_data.Description: Being a wizard, Ranthor liked to dress in fine clothes and keep his appearance in good order; many of his robes were blue, which was his signature color.
document_data.Possessions: After his death, Ranthor left Shal all his personal items, including a [[staff of power]], a [[cloth of many pockets]], a [[ring of three wishes]], a [[wand of wonder]], and his [[familiar]], [[Cerulean]].

History.Death: While communicating with Shal through a [[crystal ball]], Ranthor was stabbed from behind by a dark [[dagger]] wielded by an unknown killer who wore a strange serpent-headed armlet.
